Geological Timescale

This App shows the geological timescale of the earth's history. The most recent geologic periods are at the top, the most ancient periods are at the bottom. The larger units are at the left, the smaller units are at the right.


Usage:

Plus: Add a column with smaller units at the right.
Minus: Remove the column with smallest units.
Swipe-Left: Move the display towards the smaller units.
Swipe-Right: Move the display towards the larger units.



Credits
